Apply Twin Damage.name: Apply Twin Damage
Apply Twin Damage.description:
The system by default does not support applying damage from the Twin trait easily.

You can give yourself this "feat" to be granted a checkbox that allows you to do just that.

It works with or without @UUID[Compendium.magus.magus-class-features.Item.A8SSYFAvW88FW1hU]{Diametric Fusion}.

Rope.name: Rope
Rope.description:
50 feet of rope.

Foundry Note Inputted as a weapon so you can use it with @UUID[Compendium.magus.magus-class-features.Item.M9FPKyp1YSwXavCR]{Scourging Lash}.

Spellshell.name: Spellshell
Spellshell.description: To be used by the @UUID[Compendium.magus.magus-macros.Macro.Sny8XczR6ZDB2XRZ]{Prepare a Spellshell} macro as a base for spellshells.
